title: How to increase the Transaction Timeout in JBoss / WildFly
content: Transaction timeout in WildFly / JBoss can be configured in the transactions subsystem or at EJB level. When the transaction is configured in the transactions subsystem it will be the default transaction timeout for all JTA transactions.
